subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
Unorthodox variant {{Han simp|濁|f=蜀|t=虫|nocap=y}} found in the Ming dynasty orthographic dictionary <big>《字學三正》</big>. Also found in 《{{w2|zh|宋元以來俗字譜}}》, a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant forms}} dictionary compiled in 1930.

Eventually adopted as an official {{w|Simplified Chinese|simplified character}} by the People's Republic of China in the 1956 {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme}}. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 -->
